data.text: A huge sea monster in Norwegian legend.
data.attributionText: from The American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A mythical sea-monster said to appear at times off the coast of Norway.
A fabulous Scandinavian sea monster, often represented as resembling an island, but sometimes as resembling an immense octopus.
data.attributionText: from the GNU version of the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.
